metadata.title: CVE-2021-3392 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the MegaRAID emulator of QEMU. This issue occurs while processing SCSI I/O requests in the case of an error mptsas_free_request() that does not dequeue the request object 'req' from a pending requests queue. This flaw allows a privileged guest user to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial of service. Versions between 2.10.0 and 5.2.0 are potentially affected.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.2+dfsg-9ubuntu3.1').
